events.message: I received my order yesterday, but I want to return the product and get a refund because it doesn’t meet my expectations.
The customer's request involves a refund due to dissatisfaction with the purchased product; case is categorized under Refund.
Assigning this refund request case to our Returns Specialist team to handle the process efficiently.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with your refund request and make the process as smooth as possible.
Could you please provide the order number and the reason for your refund so we can proceed accordingly?
My order number is 7890456, and I want a refund because the product is not what was described and doesn’t work as expected.
We can initiate the refund process immediately. Please ship the item back to us using the prepaid return label we will send shortly.
Thank you, I appreciate your prompt response and the prepaid label offer. I will return the item today.
We received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since your refund has been processed and there are no further questions, we are closing this support case now. Thank you for contacting us!
